item.title: Almond Butter Pumfu Stir Fry
item.dc:creator: Katie Austin
item.description:
I love this recipe from our holistic nutritionist and cleanse expert Elissa Goodman. One serving of pumfu has 17 grams of plant-based protein! You can serve this as stir fry over rice or noodles with your favorite veggies!

item.title: Low Carb, High Protein Spaghetti alla Vodka
item.dc:creator: Katie Austin
item.description:

item.title: Teriyaki Tofu Crispy Rice with Spicy Mayo
item.dc:creator: Chloe C
item.description:
Crispy rice meets savory, caramelized teriyaki tofu in this delicious bite-sized dish! Freezing the rice overnight helps it hold its shape and get extra crispy, while the spicy mayo drizzle brings everything together. Perfect for an appetizer, snack, or light

item.title: Katie’s FAVE Chicken Noodle (Orzo!) Soup
item.dc:creator: Autumn Lee
item.description:
This orzo chicken noodle is one of my fave comfort foods because you really get a little bit of everything in every bite. It’s packed full of flavor and will warm you up on those chilly fall & winter nights!!

The post Katie’s FAVE Chicken Noodle (Orzo!) Soup appeared first on KA Daily.
